attributes.action: Give Tax Breaks to Car Companies who actively produce and manufacture green vehicles for the UK Car Market
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Car Companies should be made aware that if they can create vehicles that have low carbon emissions and are energy efficient and can help in reducing global warming, and that this goverment will support them if they actively pursue ways in producing and manufacturing green vehicles by giving them tax breaks, therefore reducing the cost to the users to purchase themwhilst maintaing profits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
